short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never accidentally close tabs again! Click the extension for a confirmation dialog before closing. Browse with peace of mind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Does it happen for you to accidentally close the tab? Well, here's a solution to prevent that from happening! With a simple click on the extension, you can easily make a confirmation dialog before closing the tab.
